name: Flappy Bird - HW3
description:
Flappy Bird - HW3 - Readme :)

The main functionality of this game is to control the bird traversing as far as possible. 

The further the bird gets, the higher score you achieve.

The bird can only move in the horizontal direction.

Users need to press the 'UP' key to elevate the bird's height.

There will appear obstacles along the way which are pipes of different sizes.

Each pipe contains a free space for the bird to fly through.

The game ends when the bird hits the pipe.

Thanks, Hossein.
